ContentAssocPredicate.description: The object is a member of the subject.
The object is related to the subject.

MetaDataPredicate.description: Name of the author or creator of the subject.
eMail address of the author or creator of the subject.
The date and time of the event in format [yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss].
The location where subject event took place.
The name of a person involved in the subject event.

ElectronicText.textData:
<#assign mapKey=wrapMapKey?if_exists/> <#assign subDataResourceId=wrapDataResourceId?if_exists/> <#assign subDataResourceTypeId=wrapDataResourceTypeId?if_exists/> <#assign contentIdTo=wrapContentIdTo?if_exists/> <#assign mimeTypeId=wrapMimeTypeId?if_exists/> <#assign subContentId=wrapSubContentId?if_exists/>
${mapKey?if_exists} [Find] <#assign ofbizRequest=""/> <#assign httpParams="contentIdTo=" + contentIdTo?if_exists + "&mapKey=" + mapKey?if_exists /> <#if subDataResourceTypeId == "IMAGE_OBJECT"> <#assign ofbizRequest="EditLayoutImage"/> <#else> <#if subDataResourceTypeId == "URL_RESOURCE"> <#assign ofbizRequest="EditLayoutUrl"/> <#else> <#assign ofbizRequest="EditLayoutSubContent"/> [New] <#if subContentId?exists && (0 < subContentId?length)> [Edit]
<@renderWrappedText/>

CharacterSet.description: US-ASCII as defined in ANSI X3.4-1986

<#assign thisContentId=contentId?if_exists/> <@traverseSubContentCache subContentId=thisContentId pickWhen="mapKey != null && mapKey.equals(\"IMAGE\")" returnFromPickWhen="mapKey != null && mapKey.equals(\"IMAGE\")" > <#assign drDataResourceId=content.dataResourceId?if_exists/>
<@renderSubContentCache mapKey="ARTICLE" contentId=thisContentId subContentId=""/>
<#assign thisContentId = ""/> <#if nodeTrailCsv?exists> <#assign idList = nodeTrailCsv?split(",")/> <#if 0 < idList?size > <#assign thisContentId = idList?last> View
<#assign thisContentId = ""/> <#if nodeTrailCsv?exists> <#assign idList = nodeTrailCsv?split(",")/> <#if 0 < idList?size > <#assign thisContentId = idList?last> ${wrappedContent?if_exists} View

${wrappedContent} <#assign listSize=listSize?number/> <#assign viewIndex=viewIndex?number/> <#assign highIndex=highIndex?number/> <#assign lowIndex=lowIndex?number/> <#assign requestURL=requestURL?if_exists/> <#assign queryString=queryString?if_exists/> <#assign lowIndexShow=lowIndex + 1 /> <#if highIndex < lowIndexShow > <#assign lowIndexShow=highIndex/> <#if 0 < listSize> <#if 0 < viewIndex> Previous <#else> Previous <#if 0 < listSize> ${lowIndexShow} - ${highIndex?if_exists} of ${listSize?if_exists} <#if highIndex?if_exists < listSize?if_exists> Next <#else> Next

<#assign mapKey=wrapMapKey?if_exists/> <#assign subDataResourceId=wrapDataResourceId?if_exists/> <#assign subDataResourceTypeId=wrapDataResourceTypeId?if_exists/> <#assign contentIdTo=wrapContentIdTo?if_exists/> <#assign mimeTypeId=wrapMimeTypeId?if_exists/> <#assign subContentId=wrapSubContentId?if_exists/>
${mapKey?if_exists} [Find] <#assign ofbizRequest=""/> <#assign httpParams="contentIdTo=" + contentIdTo?if_exists + "&mapKey=" + mapKey?if_exists /> <#if subDataResourceTypeId == "IMAGE_OBJECT"> <#assign ofbizRequest="EditLayoutImage"/> <#else> <#if subDataResourceTypeId == "URL_RESOURCE"> <#assign ofbizRequest="EditLayoutUrl"/> <#else> <#assign ofbizRequest="EditLayoutSubContent"/> [New] <#if subContentId?exists && (0 < subContentId?length)> [Edit]
<@renderWrappedText/>

<#assign contentIdTo=contentIdTo?if_exists/> <@checkPermission entityOperation="_CREATE" targetPurpose="${targetPurpose?if_exists}"> New
<#assign outputIndex = 0/> <#if outputIndex?exists > <#assign outputIndex = outputIndex?number/> <#else> <#assign outputIndex = 0/> <#if listSize?exists > <#assign listSize = listSize?number/> <#else> <#assign listSize = 0/> <#if viewIndex?exists > <#assign viewIndex = viewIndex?number/> <#else> <#assign viewIndex = 0/> <#if lowIndex?exists > <#assign lowIndex = lowIndex?number/> <#else> <#assign lowIndex = 0/> <#assign lowPlusOne = lowIndex + 1/> <#assign prevStr = ""/> <#if highIndex?exists > <#assign highIndex = highIndex?number/> <#else> <#assign highIndex = 0/> <#assign hiIndex = highIndex -1 /> <#assign nextStr = ""/>
<#if 0 < lowIndex?if_exists > <#assign prevArg=(viewIndex - 1)?string /> Prev <#if 0 < outputIndex > ${lowIndex?if_exists}-${outputIndex?if_exists} <#else> No records found <#if highIndex < listSize > <#assign nextArg=(viewIndex + 1)?string /> Next
